alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 28 at 2:11PM EST until November 29 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 degrees expected. * WHERE...Coastal Bryan, Coastal Chatham, Coastal Liberty and Coastal McIntosh Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The duration of freezing temperatures will average 1 to 3 hours. Areas of frost is also possible away from the immediate coast, becoming patchier just inland from the coast and larger bodies of water.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Coastal Liberty; Coastal McIntosh
